casebody.data:
NATIONAL LABOR RELATIONS BOARD, Petitioner, v. T. A. TREDWAY, an Individual, and S. E. Taylor, an Individual, and d/b/a Taylor Manufacturing Co., Respondents. No. 15369. United States Court of Appeals Fifth Circuit June 10, 1955. Marcel Mallet-Prevost, Asst. Gen. Counsel, David P. Findling, Associate Gen. Counsel, N.L.R.B., Arnold Ordman, Morris A. Solomon, Washington, D. C., for petitioner. No appearance for respondent.

Before HUTCHESON, Chief Judge, JONES, Circuit Judge, and CHRIS-TENBERRY, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

No opposition being made thereto, ancl it appearing that the petition is meritorious, enforcement of the Board’s or der is granted.
